languages.text: {n}Вы всматриваетесь во мрак, и со временем очертания объектов, что скрываются в тенях, начинают проявляться. Гниющие трупы, шершавые стены, предсмертные движения зараженных, брошенных здесь умирать. Вы не видите света в этом месте — лишь еще больший мрак и отчаяние.{/n}

{n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы всматриваетесь во мрак, и со временем очертания объектов, что скрываются в тенях, начинают проявляться. Гниющие трупы, шершавые стены, предсмертные движения зараженных, брошенных здесь умирать. Вы не видите света в этом месте — лишь еще больший мрак и отчаяние.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. The rotting corpses; the rough walls; the final writhing and twitching of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only yet more darkness and despair.{/n}

{n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. The rotting corpses; the rough walls; the final writhing and twitching of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only yet more darkness and despair.{/n}

{n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

{n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

{n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

{n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Escudriñas la oscuridad y, poco a poco, consigues distinguir los contornos de los objetos ocultos en las sombras. Cadáveres en descomposición. Muros irregulares. Los últimos estertores de los infectados abandonados para morir. No ves ninguna luz en este lugar, tan solo oscuridad y desesperación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Escudriñas la oscuridad y, poco a poco, consigues distinguir los contornos de los objetos ocultos en las sombras. Cadáveres en descomposición. Muros irregulares. Los últimos estertores de los infectados abandonados para morir. No ves ninguna luz en este lugar, tan solo oscuridad y desesperación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが暗闇を覗き込むと、影に隠されていたモノの輪郭が徐々に見えてくる。腐乱死体。荒れた壁。ここに置き去られた感染者の、身をよじる死に様。この場所に光はなく、暗闇と絶望だけが広がっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが暗闇を覗き込むと、影に隠されていたモノの輪郭が徐々に見えてくる。腐乱死体。荒れた壁。ここに置き去られた感染者の、身をよじる死に様。この場所に光はなく、暗闇と絶望だけが広がっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你凝视着黑暗，渐渐辨认出阴影之中的轮廓。你看到了腐烂的尸体，粗糙的墙壁，以及感染者被丢到这里等死时的临终抽搐与痛苦。你在这里看不到一丝光明，只看到了无尽的黑暗与绝望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你凝视着黑暗，渐渐辨认出阴影之中的轮廓。你看到了腐烂的尸体，粗糙的墙壁，以及感染者被丢到这里等死时的临终抽搐与痛苦。你在这里看不到一丝光明，只看到了无尽的黑暗与绝望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spähst in die Dunkelheit und erkennst langsam die Umrisse von Objekten, die in den Schatten verborgen sind. Verrottende Leichen. Grobe Wände. Die Todeszuckungen von Infizierten, die hier zum Sterben zurückgelassen wurden. Du siehst kein Licht an diesem Ort, nur noch mehr Dunkelheit und Verzweiflung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spähst in die Dunkelheit und erkennst langsam die Umrisse von Objekten, die in den Schatten verborgen sind. Verrottende Leichen. Grobe Wände. Die Todeszuckungen von Infizierten, die hier zum Sterben zurückgelassen wurden. Du siehst kein Licht an diesem Ort, nur noch mehr Dunkelheit und Verzweiflung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous plongez votre regard dans l'obscurité et parvenez peu à peu à distinguer les contours d'objets dissimulés dans les ombres. Des cadavres en décomposition. Des murs rêches. Les derniers soubresauts d'infectés abandonnés à leur sort. Vous ne voyez aucune lumière dans cet endroit. Seulement les ténèbres et le désespoir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karanlığa dikkatle bakıyorsun. Gölgelerde saklı nesnelerin dış hatlarını gittikçe daha rahat çözmeye başlıyorsun. Çürüyen cesetler, sert duvarlar, burada ölüme terk edilmiş hastalıklı insanların seğirerek can çekişi... Burada hiç ışık görmüyorsun. Yalnızca daha fazla karanlık ve keder var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You peer into the darkness, and are gradually able to make out the outlines of objects hidden in the shadows. Rotting corpses. Rough walls. The twitching death throes of infected people left here to die. You see no light in this place, only more darkness and despair.{/n}
